mapper.sql:
SELECT REC_ID as "recId", ORDER_CODE as "orderCode", PLAN_CODE as "planCode", PLAN_NAME as "planName", LINE_NO as "lineNo", LINE_NAME as "lineName", POSITION1_NAME as "position1Name", POSITION1_CODE as "position1Code", SUBJECT_CODE as "subjectCode", SUBJECT_NAME as "subjectName", SYSTEM_CODE as "systemCode", SYSTEM_NAME as "systemName", EQUIP_TYPE_CODE as "equipTypeCode", EQUIP_TYPE_NAME as "equipTypeName", WORKER_GROUP_CODE as "workerGroupCode", WORK_GROUP_NAME as "workGroupName", WORKER_NAME as "workerName", WORKER_CODE as "workerCode", SEND_PERSON_ID as "sendPersonId", SEND_PERSON_NAME as "sendPersonName", SEND_TIME as "sendTime", ACK_TIME as "ackTime", ACK_PERSON_ID as "ackPersonId", ACK_PERSON_NAME as "ackPersonName", CONFIR_TIME as "confirTime", PLAN_START_TIME as "planStartTime", PLAN_END_TIME as "planEndTime", REAL_START_TIME as "realStartTime", REAL_END_TIME as "realEndTime", WORK_STATUS as "workStatus", WORK_FINISH_STATUS as "workFinishStatus", ABNORMAL_NUMBER as "abnormalNumber", WORK_DETAIL as "workDetail", STARTWORK_TIME as "startworkTime", CANCEL_PERSON_ID as "cancelPersonId", CANCEL_PERSON_NAME as "cancelPersonName", CANCEL_TIME as "cancelTime", TRIAL_STATUS as "trialStatus", WORK_FLOW_INST_ID as "workFlowInstId", WORK_FLOW_INST_STATUS as "workFlowInstStatus", COMPANY_CODE as "companyCode", COMPANY_NAME as "companyName", REC_CREATOR as "recCreator", REC_CREATE_TIME as "recCreateTime", REC_REVISOR as "recRevisor", REC_REVISE_TIME as "recReviseTime", REC_DELETE_TIME as "recDeleteTime", DELETE_FLAG as "deleteFlag", ARCHIVE_FLAG as "archiveFlag", REMARK as "remark", LAST_UPDATE_PERSON as "lastUpdatePerson",
(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM WBPLAT.TDMER26 T26 WHERE T26.ORDER_CODE = WBPLAT.TDMER21.ORDER_CODE) as "recDeletor", (SELECT LISTAGG(TO_CHAR(a.OBJECT_NAME),',') within GROUP (order by a.OBJECT_NAME) FROM WBPLAT.TDMER22 a WHERE a.ORDER_CODE = WBPLAT.TDMER21.ORDER_CODE) as "ext1",
NVL2(TRIM(EXT2),(SELECT MAX(TDMER11.LAST_ACTION_TIME-TDMDM01.TOTAL_MILES) FROM WBPLAT.TDMER11 LEFT JOIN WBPLAT.TDMER12 ON TDMER11.PLAN_CODE=TDMER12.PLAN_CODE LEFT JOIN WBPLAT.TDMDM01 ON TDMER12.OBJECT_CODE=TDMDM01.EQUIP_CODE WHERE TDMER11.PLAN_CODE = TDMER21.PLAN_CODE AND TDMER11.SUBJECT_CODE='07' AND TDMER21.WORK_STATUS IN ('1','2','3')),'4000') as "ext3",
REC_DELETOR as "recDeletor", EXT1 as "ext1", EXT3 as "ext3",
EXT2 as "ext2", EXT4 as "ext4", EXT5 as "ext5", ( case when PLAN_NAME like '%二级修%'and to_date(PLAN_START_TIME, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')< to_date(SYSDATE-30) and WORK_STATUS='1' then 1 when PLAN_NAME like '%二级修%'and to_date(PLAN_START_TIME, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')>=to_date(SYSDATE-30) and to_date(PLAN_START_TIME, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')<= to_date(SYSDATE +3)and WORK_STATUS='1' then 2 else 9 end ) as sort
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_OVERHAUL_ORDER ( REC_ID, ORDER_CODE, PLAN_CODE, PLAN_NAME, LINE_NO, LINE_NAME, POSITION1_NAME, POSITION1_CODE, SUBJECT_CODE, SUBJECT_NAME, SYSTEM_CODE, SYSTEM_NAME, EQUIP_TYPE_CODE, EQUIP_TYPE_NAME, WORKER_GROUP_CODE, WORK_GROUP_NAME, WORKER_NAME, WORKER_CODE, SEND_PERSON_ID, SEND_PERSON_NAME, SEND_TIME, ACK_TIME, ACK_PERSON_ID, ACK_PERSON_NAME, CONFIR_TIME, PLAN_START_TIME, PLAN_END_TIME, REAL_START_TIME, REAL_END_TIME, WORK_STATUS, WORK_FINISH_STATUS, ABNORMAL_NUMBER, WORK_DETAIL, STARTWORK_TIME, CANCEL_PERSON_ID, CANCEL_PERSON_NAME, CANCEL_TIME, TRIAL_STATUS, WORK_FLOW_INST_ID, WORK_FLOW_INST_STATUS, COMPANY_CODE, COMPANY_NAME, REC_CREATOR, REC_CREATE_TIME, REC_REVISOR, REC_REVISE_TIME, REC_DELETOR, REC_DELETE_TIME, DELETE_FLAG, ARCHIVE_FLAG, REMARK, LAST_UPDATE_PERSON, EXT1, EXT2, EXT3, EXT4, EXT5 ) VALUES ( #{recId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{planCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{planName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lineNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lineName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{position1Name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{position1Code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subjectCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subjectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{systemCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{systemName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{equipTypeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{equipTypeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{workerGroupCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{workGroupName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{workerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{workerCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sendPersonId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sendPersonName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sendTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ackTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ackPersonId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ackPersonName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{confirTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{planStartTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{planEndTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{realStartTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{realEndTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{workStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{workFinishStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{abnormalNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{workDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startworkTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cancelPersonId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cancelPersonName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cancelTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{trialStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{workFlowInstId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{workFlowInstStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recCreator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recCreateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recRevisor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recReviseTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recDeletor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recDeleteTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '0', #{archiveFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastUpdatePerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ext1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ext2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ext3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ext4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ext5,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

INSERT INTO T_OVERHAUL_ORDER_DETAIL ( REC_ID, PLAN_CODE, PLAN_NAME, OBJECT_CODE, OBJECT_NAME, TASK_CONTENT, TASK_AREA, TASK_REQUEST, TASK_REMARK, TASK_PERSON_ID, TASK_PERSON_NAME, OBJECT_STATUS, TEMPLATE_ID, TEMPLATE_NAME, LINE_NO, LINE_NAME, POSITION1_NAME, POSITION2_CODE, SUBJECT_CODE, SUBJECT_NAME, SYSTEM_CODE, SYSTEM_NAME, EQUIP_TYPE_CODE, EQUIP_TYPE_NAME, ORDER_CODE, TASK_SPOT, STOP_TIME, REPAIR_STATUS, REPAIR_DETAIL, START_TIME, COMPLITE_TIME, REPAIR_PERSON, ABNORMAL_NUMBER, SELF_CHECK, SELF_CHECK_TIME, SELF_CHECK_REMARK, MUTUAL_CHECK, MUTUAL_CHECK_TIME, MUTUAL_CHECK_REMARK, EXPERT_CHECK, EXPERT_CHECK_TIME, EXPERT_CHECK_REMARK, REC_CREATOR, REC_CREATE_TIME, REC_REVISOR, REC_REVISE_TIME, REC_DELETOR, REC_DELETE_TIME, DELETE_FLAG, ARCHIVE_FLAG, REMARK, EXT1, EXT2, EXT3, EXT4, EXT5 ) VALUES ( #{recId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{planCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{planName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{objectCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{objectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taskContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taskArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taskRequest,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taskRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taskPersonId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taskPersonName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{objectStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{templateId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{templateName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lineNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lineName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{position1Name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{position2Code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subjectCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subjectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{systemCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{systemName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{equipTypeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{equipTypeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taskSpot,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stopTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{repairStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{repairDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{compliteTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{repairPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{abnormalNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{selfCheck,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{selfCheckTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{selfCheckRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mutualCheck,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mutualCheckTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mutualCheckRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{expertCheck,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{expertCheckTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{expertCheckRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recCreator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recCreateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recRevisor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recReviseTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recDeletor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recDeleteTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '0', #{archiveFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ext1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ext2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ext3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ext4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ext5,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
